summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4945 for the improvement of the alley in block 2, J.J. McGilvra's 2nd Addition, and the alley in block 2, Replat of J.J. McGilvra's 3rd Addition, being the alleys between 41st Avenue North and 42nd Avenue North, from East Lee Street to East Garfield Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 56743.
